entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
